title: Hana-Chan Gentei Kareshi - Konya Mo Amaku Ijiwaru Ni Semarareteimasu
alternative_title: Hana-chan Gentei Kareshi - Konya mo Amaku Ijiwaru ni Semarareteimasu ; Hana-chan's exclusive boyfriend -Being sweetly teased again tonight ; Hana-chan's Exclusive Boyfriend: Being Sweetly Teased Again Tonight ; 오늘 밤 한정 남자친구 ; 花ちゃん限定カレシ～今夜も甘くイジワルに迫られています
status: Hana-chan Gentei Kareshi - Konya mo Amaku Ijiwaru ni Semarareteimasu ; Hana-chan's exclusive boyfriend -Being sweetly teased again tonight ; Hana-chan's Exclusive Boyfriend: Being Sweetly Teased Again Tonight ; 오늘 밤 한정 남자친구 ; 花ちゃん限定カレシ～今夜も甘くイジワルに迫られています
description:
Description :
        Hana Masaki, an office lady with an easily influenced personality, has one and only solace - the bar filled with her beloved books and its owner, Kirishima-san. She can do her job well because he's there! However, one day, by a twist of fate, she ends up asking Kirishima-san to play the role of her boyfriend?!
